response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unique qualities and unparalleled craftsmanship. Given its worth to you stands at $800,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer encapsulates a fantastic chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
